note: I used to work in tech and now I’ve completely changed direction and mainly design and sell cross-stitch pieces and prints.  Interested in privacy and data rights, plus about 50 other things I'm into. Love music and fanatical about SAFC. Background image is Blackhall cliff tops looking back towards the Roman arch bridge near Crimdon in the spring time with the wild flowers.  Profile image is me, with newly cut short brown hair and a big smile on my face.
